title: Heartbreaker
description: Coming back to sell my childhood home should've been easy. Nothing in life is easy. Especially when Catherine Wells is determined to make it hard. And by hard, I mean, well... hard.   She's sweet and feisty and determined to get under my skin in every way imaginable.  Now, I have something new to focus on.  Her.  I shouldn't even be thinking about her.  I should just walk away.  They call me a heartbreaker but they've never met Catherine Wells.
author: Logan Chance
